name: The Game's Afoot
description: Mysterious events are occuring which cannot be explained through temporal anomaly alone. Join the legendary duo of Detective Data and Doctor La Forge to find the answers!
rules:
— In an Expedition Event, your crew does NOT recover after attempting a challenge. Can your crew make it to the end of the Expedition?
— Unique Away Team Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of The Professor, Data or La Forge will provide a bonus to Event Away Team Missions.
— Every Event Away Team Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points.
— Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards. Rewards will be sent out at the end of the event!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
- "2X Rewards" Ad Views do not double Victory Points earned on Expedition Away Team Missions
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: The Professor, Data, or La Forge
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Away Team Missions!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 100.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

content.rules: — Spend Tickets to attempt missions in the Expedition Event. — Remember, crew skills will not recover until Ticket has expired. Take advantage of featured crew The Professor, Data, and La Forge, who will not tire as quickly!
content.speaker: The Game's Afoot
content.description: "Geordi and I are made up of matter which can exist outside of a holodeck. This Victorian garb is not. By what means does it persist without a holographic projector? As my doppelganger might say, the game is afoot."

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Quantum physicists and temporal engineers have had to eject everything they know out the airlock in this crisis. Holographic characters are somehow existing outside of a holodeck. Holographic clothes too, as you can see."

"What we have noticed is that all of these holograms have something in common: they're attempting to play out their programs. Data and I believe we should copy them. Maybe by solving smaller mysteries, we'll solve the bigger one."
